structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
CITY-COUNTY METROPOLITAN SEWER, SEWER CONSTRUCTION, AND SANITATION DISTRICTS

law.catch_line: Additional or alternate method of financing construction.
law.text: Any sewer construction district created in the manner provided in KRS 76.300 to 76.325 may, if the commissioners of such district deem it advisable, use the authority and procedures granted to incorporated municipalities by KRS 107.010 to 107.220. When applied to sewer construction districts, terms used in KRS 107.010 to 107.220 shall be construed to mean the following: "city" means "district"; "ordinance" means "resolution"; "clerk" means "secretary of district"; "governing body" means "district commissioners"; "mayor or chairman of board of directors" means "chairman of the district."
law.history: Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 198, sec. 1, effective June 16, 1960.
